text: He imandarasakala! Nihatasakalara ksetrata tomalokara oparata kicacara bidhana pharaja karaa haiche. Sbadhina byaktira binimayata sbadhina byakti, kraitadasara binimayata kraitadasa, naraira binimayata narai. Kintu tara bhatrra phalara paraa ksama pradarsana karaa ha'le yathayatha bidhira anusarana karaa arau satatara saite tara rakta-binimaya adaya karaa kartabya. E'ito tomalokara pratipalakara phalara paraa sithilata arau anugraha. Eteke iyara pichato yiye simalanghana karae tara babe ache yantranadayaka sasti
